page.description: Specifies if the fonts in the UX Component should be scaled to make them larger or smaller. Doing this will also scale the size of many controls in the component. Select 'Medium' for no scaling, i.e. the fonts shown will match those defined in the style sheet.

section.description: This property has a very similar effect to the [Use compact theme] function. Here is the property set to the 'smallest' option.
